thoughts: Wonders how c_n is doing without {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} leadership
Wishes {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could give new leaders lives
Misses having control over c_n
Wonders if {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could have chosen a better deputy to take over after {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} death
Realizes how little {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} status means in the Dark Forest
Tries to call a Clan meeting
Has a circle of Dark Forest warriors around {PRONOUN/m_c/object}, plotting something
Misses being visited by StarClan cats
Is feeling very bitter
Distantly watches over c_n
Knows {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could have been a better leader
Wonders if {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}'ll ever be forgotten
Is gloating about having {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} name forever engraved in c_n's history
Is forgetting the Warrior Code
Peeks over the StarClan border, only to be swiftly clawed away by a starry-pelted cat
Wants revenge on those who wronged {PRONOUN/m_c/object}
Is playing the victim
Cleans blood off their muddy paws
Has a winning streak in battles
Enjoys when the other Dark Forest cats look to them for guidance
